MicrobiomeExperiment 0.99.0.9013

    • Basic storage, access, and manipulation of phylogenetic sequencing data with *MicrobiomeExperiment*
    • Useful functions for working with *MicrobiomeExperiment*

Coerce phyloseq object

Source: R/makeMicrobiomeExperimentFromphyloseq.R
makeMicrobiomeExperimentFromphyloseq.Rd

Coerce phyloseq object

makeMicrobiomeExperimentFromphyloseq(obj)

Arguments

obj

a phyloseq object

Value

An object of class MicrobiomeExperiment

Examples

if (requireNamespace("phyloseq")) {
    data(GlobalPatterns, package="phyloseq")
    makeMicrobiomeExperimentFromphyloseq(GlobalPatterns)
    data(enterotype, package="phyloseq")
    makeMicrobiomeExperimentFromphyloseq(enterotype)
    data(esophagus, package="phyloseq")
    makeMicrobiomeExperimentFromphyloseq(esophagus)
}
